description.value: You smash, bust, and charge through solid obstacles without hesitation. @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Stride]{Stride} twice. Once during your movement, if your movement passes through or ends adjacent to a door, window, fence, wall, or similar obstacle, you can attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Force Open]{Force Open} the obstacle with a +1 circumstance bonus to the roll; on a failure, your movement ends at that obstacle.
